autoExecute.description: When true, automatically starts runbook execution on enrichment match. When false, proposes for human approval first.

requireApprovalPerStep.description: When true, each runbook step requires separate human approval. When false, approving the runbook approves all steps.

stepTimeoutMs.description: Maximum time (ms) to wait for a step to complete before marking it failed.

maxConcurrentRunbooks.description: Maximum number of runbooks that can be executing simultaneously.

maxRunbookHistory.description: Maximum number of completed runbook executions to retain in history.

cooldownMs.description: Cooldown period after running a runbook for the same incident before another can start.

severityFilter.description: Only trigger runbooks for incidents at these severity levels.
